Requirement description: An aspect could be a (physical or non-physical) entity or it could be a quality
A thing can have relations to other things
A thing is an entity that can be identified in the oneM2M System.
A device can optionally  have a description
A device can optionally  have a description
A device shall have a model property
A device shall have a model property
A function represents the functionality necessary to accomplish the task for which a device is designed
A service is a representation of a function to a network that makes this function discoverable; registerable and remotely controllable by other devices in the network
The profile allows to describe the energy or power production and consumption of a certain device.
